flavorText: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

foreignData.name: Agressivität
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Nichtmauerkreatur erhält Erstschlag und verursacht ab jetzt Trampelschaden. Zerstöre die Kreatur am Ende des Zuges ihres Beherrschers, wenn sie nicht angegriffen hat.

name: Aggression
originalText: Target non-wall creature gains first strike and trample. At the end of its controller's turn, destroy that creature if it did not attack that turn.

rulings.text: Moving the enchantment after the ability triggers will not affect which creatures are affected.

text:
Enchant non-Wall creature
Enchanted creature has first strike and trample.
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.
